member.name: T:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service
member.summary: Represents an OAuth 1 based service.

member.name: C:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service(System.String,System.String)
member.param: Uniquely identifies this service type.
Text used to label this service in the UI.
member.summary: Constructions and initializes a new instances of the class.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service.AccessTokenUrl
member.summary: Gets the access token URL.
member.value: The URL that the access token is requested at.

remarks.para: When creating your own , you will find this URL in the authentication section of the documentation for the service you're implementing.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service.AuthorizeUrl
member.summary: Gets the authorize URL.
member.value: The initial url to start authorization.

remarks.para: When creating your own , you will find this URL in the authentication section of the documentation for the service you're implementing.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service.CallbackUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the callback URL.
member.value: The URL used to indicate authorization has completed.

remarks.para: This URL is generally supplied by you to the service when telling it about your app and is required. The URL supplied to the service and the one provided here must match for a successful authentication.
"localhost" and "urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob" are not supported.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service.ConsumerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets your consumer key.

remarks.para: This value is supplied to you by the service when you create your app in the service's developer panel.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Social.OAuth1Service.ConsumerSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets your consumer secret.

remarks.para: This value is supplied to you by the service when you create your app in the service's developer panel.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Social.Service.GetAuthenticator
member.summary: Gets the authenticator for this service.

remarks.para: The authenticator will present the user interface needed to authenticate a new account for the service. This account will then be saved.

remarks.para: On iOS, you must dismiss the view controller in the as it won't dismiss itself.
